data.name: Nomori: Prologue
data.detailed_description: Nomori is a mind-bending third-person puzzle game. Rotate portals to change your perspective, reverse the timeflow of objects to solve puzzles and explore a twisted and magical spirit world. The game is currently in pre-alpha.
data.about_the_game: Nomori is a mind-bending third-person puzzle game. Rotate portals to change your perspective, reverse the timeflow of objects to solve puzzles and explore a twisted and magical spirit world. The game is currently in pre-alpha.
data.short_description: Traverse a magical spirit world in mind-bending ways in Nomori Pre-Alpha. Play as Kiko and explore a twisted and magical spirit world. reverse the timeflow of objects to solve puzzles. Rotate portals to change your perspective and let walls and ceilings become floors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790k,4.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
